ref: 5934 tr̥prá3 ʻ pungent (Geldner) ʼ RV., ʻ salty ʼ KātyŚr. [~ *tr̥pu -- . -- Cf. tr̥pradaṁśín -- AV. ~ tīvradaśana-<-> Bhartr̥. and Parth. tfr ʻ a kind of cheese ʼ, Pers. tarf ʻ white milk cheese (?) ʼ < *tr̥pra -- W. Henning BSOS ix 88. -- see *tuppa -- ]
Kho. trup ʻ salt ʼ, (Lor. also) ʻ radish ʼ: semant. cf.
